name: playwright-cli
description: CLI tool for Playwright browser automation - connect to existing instances or launch new ones

scripts.build:bun: bun build src/index.ts --compile --outfile playwright-bun --external electron --external chromium-bidi
scripts.build: pnpm run build:ts && pnpm run build:node
scripts.build:windows: pnpm run build:ts && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output playwright.exe
scripts.build:linux: pnpm run build:ts && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output playwright
scripts.build:all: pnpm run build:ts && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-macos-arm64,node18-win-x64,node18-linux-x64 --output playwright
scripts.install: pnpm run build && mkdir -p ~/.local/bin && cp playwright ~/.local/bin/
scripts.ci: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run test:coverage
